visualization_prompt: Generate a bar chart showing percentage distribution of organic farming areas across EU countries using ranked categorical comparison with value annotations

title.text: Top 10 EU countries in organic farming area (2018)

visualization_explanation: The dataset contains univariate categorical data with 10 ordered observations representing percentage values. Synthetic data preserves Eurostat's original country rankings while maintaining percentage distribution validity (∑=152.3% reflects multiple land use counting). Values follow plausible agricultural capacity constraints with Austria's 24.1% peak within EU sustainability targets. The horizontal bar chart maximizes data-ink ratio by eliminating redundant gridlines while using position-aligned data labels. Cairo's length perception principle enables accurate magnitude comparisons through aligned baselines. Color saturation (μ=65% luminance in #a5d6a7) ensures accessibility while maintaining visual hierarchy. Rank ordering supports efficient pattern recognition of agricultural policy outcomes across member states.
